data.title: 12 actors from Harry Potter movies who’ve been in ‘Doctor Who’
data.meta_description: Here we take a look at some of the British actors who’ve appeared in both Harry Potter and Doctor Who…   Michael Gambon as Dumbledore and Kazran Sardick in ‘A Christmas Carol’   Zoe Wanamaker as Madam Hooch and Lady Cassandra in ‘The End of the World’ and ‘New Earth’   Toby Jones as Dobby … >
